data.title: Buy Royalties & Intellectual Property Rights Income
data.meta_description: Royalty Exchange is a marketplace where investors can buy income-generating intellectual property and other royalty streams as alternative investments.
data.text:
Searching for Yield?

Royalty Exchange gives both retail and institutional investors access to royalty streams previously available only to industry insiders, private equity, or institutional funds.

Through our unique marketplace, Â you can now build a portfolio of uncorrelated, yield-generating royalties with a documented track record of consistent income across multiple assets, price levels, and termsâ¦

â*Six month annualized asset return on investment Jan - June, 2020.

Why Royalties Belong in Your Portfolio

Investors are always looking for ways to protect their money while maximizing overall returns. Stock and bond markets can be unpredictable and susceptible to macro events, which is why many turn to alternative investments to diversify. Royalties provide a great option. Owners of intellectual property get paid every time someone uses their work. They create an asset once, and then collect payment over and over again.

Passive Income

Royalties let you earn money while you sleep. They are a âcut off the top,â paid regularly, that put you first in line to receive the cash flows they generate.
